name: Invenxels
description:
Just a small voxel building application.

Get your creative juices flowing and enjoy! It's a small game with no objectives, but you can build just about anything!

Works with a controller, tho there's input delay cuz HTML5 go BRRRR

If you enjoy it, do tell me so I can maybe add more blocks in the future. Send me your creations on twitter if you do make something cool!
